title: Automated Health Alerts for Safety
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to monitor my health and send automated alerts in case of emergencies so that I can ensure my safety while managing arthritis and maintaining my independence.

title: Medication Management Support
summary: As a retired social worker, I want automated reminders for my medication schedule so that I can manage my arthritis pain effectively and maintain my health while staying socially connected.

title: Health Data Sharing with Caregivers
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to securely share my health data with my husband and adult children so that they can help me manage my health and ensure my well-being during my recovery.

title: Personalized Care Plan Development
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to regularly update my care plan based on my health changes so that I can manage my arthritis pain and stay physically active while maintaining my independence.

title: Emergency Health Response Coordination
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to easily request emergency assistance using voice commands so that I can quickly get help in case of a health issue without struggling with physical limitations.

title: Holistic Wellness Activities Suggestions
summary: As a retired social worker, I want personalized reminders for physical exercises that consider my mobility challenges, so that I can remain physically active and manage my arthritis pain effectively.

title: Cognitive Health Enhancement Tools
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to engage in daily cognitive challenges with adaptive difficulty so that I can stay mentally active and maintain my cognitive health while managing my arthritis and busy schedule.

title: Real-Time Feedback for Care Customization
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to provide real-time feedback on my health and well-being through ALFRED, so that my care can be tailored to my specific needs and I can stay connected with my caregivers.
